text: Grumpy Old Men or grumpy old man may refer to: ==People== * Grumpy old men, colloquial term referring to sufferers of irritable male syndrome ==Art, entertainment, and media== * "Grumpy Old Man", a 2011 episode of Family Guy * Grumpy Old Men (movie), a 1993 comedy movie starring Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau * Grumpy Old Men (TV series), a 2000s BBC Two television programme * Grumpy Old Men, an Australian TV sports programme hosted by Kevin Bartlett * Grumpy Old Man, a character played by Dana Carvey on the television show Saturday Night Live
title: Grumpy Old Men
